analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika saññojana gocchaka ādi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham nosaññojanam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ saññojanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham nogantham dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ ganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no ogham dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no yogam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ nīvaraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ parāmāsaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
